arStrings.szText:
Gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} additional Maximum Life while in Werebear form and for {c_number}{buffduration:BONUS_MAX_HEALTH}{/c} seconds after leaving Werebear form.

While {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, deal {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage, and {c_number}[{SF_4} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} damage.
